ygData.subject: RE: Suggestions for high teen levels in unrest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Unrest is perfect when there are around 40 people in the zone.  Less than 30 there and you are looking at trains.  The best place to be in your mid-20s is in a
ygData.messageBody:
Unrest is perfect when there are around 40 people in the zone. Less than 30
there and you are looking at trains. The best place to be in your mid-20s
is in a room in the house *IF* the other rooms are also camped. If you are
the only one in the house, you WILL be fighting the entire house because
everything can see through the walls and floors (except the basement). You
can get insane exp and loot in the hand room, the bar room, the tower, or
the reclusive ghoul magi room, but you have to others in the house.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
> I was at Unrest at lvl 23 with a full group including a 2nd cleric. The
> place was horrible. Death after death after death. Between deaths and
> running to the zone there were no points made. The only time we
> were there
> successfully was in a room (hand room) i think. Then shortly a high lvl
> cleric came in and ran us out....i am now almost lvl 27 and haven't been
> back yet. I may try to go back soon though...
>
